title: Holistic Health and Healing
cleaned_text: Holistic Health and Healing Spring 2023 Details Credit3 ModeOnline ComponentLecture Meets InstructorsBridget Thompson Description This course is designed to give students a broad overview of holism as it relates to health practices currently identified as "complementary and alternative medicine" (CAM). Students will learn about a variety of CAM therapies, their philosophical and cultural contexts, controversies, and how they do - or do not - interface with biomedicine. Eligibility UWW Class - University undergraduates contact Registrar's Office Notes UWW class; $60/term reg. fee + $495/credit. Refunds differ from Univ. day classes; see www.umass.edu/uww/resources/refund-policy. Select the class term "Spring 2023 " and subject "Public Health " and enter the class number "67899 ". If the class is not open for enrollment, you may need to specify other search criteria.
